oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leistungsauftrag 2004-2007 an die Stiftung Forschungsinstitut fuer biologischen Landbau (FiBL), Frick; Wissensmanagement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
In the area of knowledge transfer FiBL engages in 3 main areas:
- Communication: Publications, Internet sites, magazines, PR, research communication - Advisory Service - International Development Cooperation
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Programme} LA 04-07: Leistungsauftrag 2004-2007 an die Stiftung Forschungsinstitut fuer biologischen Landbau (FiBL), Frick; Wissensmanagement. [Mandate 2004-2007 to "Stiftung Forschungsinstitut fuer biologischen Landbau" (FiBL), Frick; Subject aerea Knowledge management.] Runs 2004 - 2007. Programme Leader(s): Morel, Prof. Jacques and Gantner, Dr. Urs.
